info.author: Stephan Jorek
info.description:
Pygments JSON Formatter
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Pygments JSON Formatter plugs into the Pygments syntax highlighting package
written in Python.

It provides generic formatters that output the token-stream as a whole or
segmented by tokens or literals in JSON.

Install the `Pygments JSON Formatter tip`_ via ``easy_install Pygments-JSON-Formatter==dev``.

.. _Pygments JSON Formatter tip:
   http://bitbucket.org/sjorek/pygments-json-formatter/get/tip.zip#egg=Pygments-JSON-Formatter-dev

:copyright: Copyright 2013 Stephan Jorek
:license: BSD, see LICENSE for details.
